tool_description: Efficiently collect real estate listings, property titles, prices, descriptions, amenities, images, characteristics, nearby attractions, and a multitude of other attributes within seconds.
name: Zoopla
title: Zoopla

api_list.name: suggestLocation
api_list.description: Lookup for locations that are available to use. This endpoint's `key` attribute is necessary for search requests.

api_list.name: getProperty
api_list.description: Returns all the detailed information of a property by its ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zoopla4.p.rapidapi.com/properties/64478427"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zoopla4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zoopla4.p.rapidapi.com/properties/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zoopla4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: searchRentalProperties
api_list.description: Returns all the properties for rent that matches up by the filters

required_parameters.name: locationKey
required_parameters.description: Location key for the search results. `key` attribute can be retrieved directly from /locations endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: minPrice
optional_parameters.description: Minimum price filter for search results

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page for the pagination of the search results

optional_parameters.name: maxBeds
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of beds filter for search results

optional_parameters.name: maxPrice
optional_parameters.description: Maximum price filter for search results

optional_parameters.name: minBeds
optional_parameters.description: Minimum number of beds filter for search results
